title: Soft italic sans/script on Carry Petfood packaging (Chips for dogs)
content:
Yup, dogs also like a little chip now and then with their aperitif. :P Anyone recognise the type on the packaging? That lowercase ‘g’ should give it away if you know this type design.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819002718im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bixnchips_4517.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: _That’s_ why! It was slanted digitally. Brilliant find, Ryuk. :)
